queries.query: -- claim jobs with j as ( select top 1 * from {schema}[Jobs] where scheduled_for <= @now and invisible_until <= @now order by invisible_until ) update j set j.claimed_by = @claimed_by, j.invisible_until = @invisible_until, j.attempt = j.attempt + 1 output inserted.row_id, inserted.job_id, inserted.scheduled_for, inserted.payload, inserted.attempt
-- keep job claim update {schema}[Jobs] set invisible_until = @invisible_until where row_id = @row_id and claimed_by = @claimed_by
-- complete job delete from {schema}[Jobs] where row_id = @row_id and claimed_by = @claimed_by
-- forget job delete from {schema}[Jobs] where row_id = @row_id and claimed_by = @claimed_by
-- retry job update {schema}[Jobs] set claimed_by = null, invisible_until = @invisible_until where row_id = @row_id and claimed_by = @claimed_by
